page.title: 14 Westmoor Brownies and Cubs
page.content: round in a circle and Brown Owl or Pack Leader shouts out colours. If she says, "Red" you must stop, Amber means walk and green means run. If you move on any other colour, then you are out. Sometimes we have to go into our groups for badges. At the moment I am doing my Pathfinder badge, which is a badge where you have to draw maps. 1985 is the 75th year of Guiding. On Tuesday, 25th June 1985 all the Guides, Rangers and Brownies from N. Tyneside went to Tynemouth to see the Flame of Friendship come in on H.M.S. Jersey. A Brownie, a Guide and a Ranger went to Buckingham Palace to ask Princess Margaret to light the flame and it burned all day and all night. We watched the boat come into the Tyne and dock. Afterwards we had a camp fire and sing-song and the newspaper camera-man came.
